archimate:Deliverable.name: Architect Concern Summary for AC-007
archimate:Deliverable.documentation:
Sami Aura and Mattias Dahlberg produced "AC-007 ISAE 3402 Audit Findings.docx".
The document contains Archi views showing:
• Concern summary - How was the problem identified? • Concern timeline - the main events in the work on this AC (Architect Concern)) • Overview of findings - Why ISAE3402 audit is required? - What was the scope of the audit and what were the key deviations found? - What were the primary deviations in Tech Services Access Management? • Identified threats and risks • What if these threats would realize? • Recommendations to mitigate risk • Timeline for way forward
